item.title: Spark + AI Summit 2019 Notes
item.description: I was fortunate enough to attend Spark + AI Summit in San Francisco in April 2019. This page contains links to all my notes from the talks I listened to.

item.title: How I built my (old) website
item.description:
You may have noticed that the Github repo for this website has a tagline “… for people who aren't web developers.” I am a data scientist and certainly fit that description, and so I'm going to talk about how I built this site using the tools I already know.

Update (Jan. 2, 2020): This post is outdated! See Migrating to Hugo for information on the new site.

item.title: Automating Predictive Modeling at Zynga with Pandas UDFs
Data Agility - A Journey to Advanced Analytics and ML at Scale
Defending Deep Learning from Adversarial Attacks
item.description: Speakers: Animesh Singh and Svetlana Levitan (IBM). They work at the “center for open source data and AI technologies” @ IBM.

item.title: Explain Yourself: Why You Get the Recommendations You Do
item.description: Speakers: Niels Hanson (KPMG), Kishori Konwar (Broad Institute @ Harvard/MIT), Guohao Xiao (KPMG)

item.title: How Graph Technology is Changing AI
Modular Apache Spark: Transform Your Code into Pieces
Understanding Query Plans and Spark UIs
Beyond Reason Codes: A Blueprint for Human-Centered, Low-Risk ML
High Performance Transfer Learning for Classifying Intent of Sales Engagement Emails: An Experimental Study
Moving a Fraud-Fighting Random Forest from sklearn to Spark with ML, MLflow, and Jupyter
item.description: Speaker: Josh Johnston (Director of AI Science @ Kount).

item.title: Smart Join Algorithms for Fighting Skew at Scale
About Me
item.description: Hi, I'm Tushar. I'm a data scientist at Nielsen in Chicago, IL. I have an interest in human-computer interaction and how technology & new media are affecting our lives. On this site, I write summaries of papers that interest me along with other articles or talks. I can be reached at: Github: tuchandra Email: me [at] tusharc [dot] dev
